description:
Ataru and the boys make a splash at the beach when they use one of Ten`s gizmos to make copies of Sakura! To get back at Ataru, Lum starts running around with a rather tall, dark, and handsome fellow.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Plenty of Sun, Plenty of Sickness
Taiyou ga Ippai Uwaki ga Ippai
太陽がいっぱい 浮気がいっぱい
